meanings.definition: The state of not being a candidate.
meanings.sent1: Her noncandidacy surprised everyone at the election.
meanings.sent2: His noncandidacy for class president left the position open for others.
meanings.sent3: The noncandidacy of the cat for mayor led to a dog being elected instead.
meanings.sent4: In a world of noncandidacy, only the brave step forward to lead.
meanings.sent5: The noncandidacy of the sun for a political role made the moon the star of the show.

meanings.definition: The act of not running for a position.
meanings.sent1: After much consideration, his noncandidacy was announced to the public.
meanings.sent2: The noncandidacy of the top athlete surprised the fans.
meanings.sent3: The noncandidacy of the clown for ringmaster caused quite a stir in the circus.
meanings.sent4: Her noncandidacy was like a silent protest against the current system.
meanings.sent5: The noncandidacy of the tree for the position of tallest in the forest was evident to all.
